name: NETXP LINUX Special Software - IBM Bigfix BESClient used
description: Monitors accesses and modifications to directories related to IBM Bigfix BESClient, located in /opt/BESClient and /var/opt/BESClient/. Detection of activities in these directories helps in maintaining the integrity and security of IBM Bigfix configurations.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "soft_besclient" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
